mapper.select: select product.name, cart.member_no, cart.product_no, sum(cart.`count`) as count, product.price, image.new_name from product, cart, member, image where member.`no` = cart.member_no and cart.product_no = product.`no` and product.`no` = image.product_no group by cart.product_no;
